mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Domain.insertDomain */ META.TB007( 도메인일련번호, 도메인명, 도메인타입, 시스템생성자, 시스템수정자, 시스템생성일, 시스템수정일 ) VALUES ( #{domainSno} :: INTEGER, #{domainName}, #{domainType}, #{sysCreator}, #{sysCreator}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT /* Domain.selectDomain */ 도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, 도메인명 AS DOMAIN_NAME, 도메인타입 AS DOMAIN_TYPE, 시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, 시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT FROM META.TB007 WHERE 1 = 1 AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: INTEGER

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /* Domain.selectDomainList */ 도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, 도메인명 AS DOMAIN_NAME, 도메인타입 AS DOMAIN_TYPE, 시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, 시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM META.TB007 WHERE 1 = 1
AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: INTEGER
AND 도메인명 LIKE '%'||#{domainName}||'%'
AND 도메인타입 LIKE '%'||#{domainType}||'%'
) FROM META.TB007 WHERE 1 = 1
AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: INTEGER
AND 도메인명 LIKE '%'||#{domainName}||'%'
AND 도메인타입 LIKE '%'||#{domainType}||'%'
ORDER BY 도메인일련번호 DESC ) A OFFSET (#{pageNum} :: INTEGER - 1) * #{rowAmountPerPage} :: INTEGER LIMIT #{rowAmountPerPage} :: INTEGER

SELECT /* Domain.selectDomainScList */ 도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, 도메인명 AS DOMAIN_NAME, 도메인타입 AS DOMAIN_TYPE, 시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, 시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM META.TB007
WHERE 1 = 1
AND 도메인명 LIKE '%'||#{domainName}||'%'
) AS COUNT FROM META.TB007 WHERE 1 = 1
AND 도메인명 LIKE '%'||#{domainName}||'%'
ORDER BY 도메인명 ASC
SELECT /* Domain.selectDomainRegAbleYn */ CASE WHEN COUNT(1) >= 1 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS DOMAIN_REG_ABLE_YN FROM META.TB007 WHERE 도메인명 = #{domainName}
mapper.update: DELETE /* Domain.deleteDomainInfo */ FROM META.TB007 WHERE 1 = 1 AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: INTEGER
